"Halfway up the mountains
where Washiba's castle stood."
jp_text: “鷲羽(わしば)の城があった山の中腹？”
google_translated: "Mountain of the mountain where the castle of Shiba  was?"

en_text: What's that?
jp_text: あれは…

en_text: This must be the area.
jp_text: この辺りか

en_text: It's an animal trail now.
jp_text: 今では獣道だな

en_text: Is this...
jp_text: これが

en_text: Washiba's castle?
jp_text: 鷲羽の城だと？
google_translated: Is it a castle of the winga?

en_text: Please forgive me.
jp_text: お許しくだされ

en_text: What?
jp_text: え？

en_text: What the...?
jp_text: ハァ ハァ… え？

en_text: Why did it try to go under it?
jp_text:
何で そこを通ろうと
思ったの？
google_translated:
I wonder why
Did you think?

en_text: Good thing it's dumb.
jp_text: アホの子で よかった
google_translated: It was good at the child of

en_text: Dad?
jp_text: （由希奈）お父さん…？

en_text: There has been no reply yet.
jp_text: （ヨルバ）返答はなかった

en_text: Not even to refuse our request?
jp_text: （イムサ）否も応もないと？
google_translated: If you do not respond to?

en_text:
It seems that they have not been able
to reach a consensus.
jp_text:
（レフィル）かの地は １つに
まとまってはいないようだ
google_translated:
or the land is one
It seems not to be put together

en_text:
In which case,
we are left with only one option.
jp_text: さすれば 残された道は１つ

en_text: Fusunani.
jp_text: フスナーニ！

en_text: Leave it to me.
jp_text: （フスナーニ）お任せあれ

en_text:
Incoming emergency transmission
from NORAD.
jp_text: ノーラッドより緊急入電！

en_text:
An atmospheric entry capsule like thing
has launched from the Efi Dorg mothership.
jp_text:
大気圏突入カプセルらしきものが
射出されました

en_text: Damn it! They're coming now?
jp_text: クソ！ 今 来るのか

en_text: Yukina... she's still missing...
jp_text: 由希奈が まだ…

en_text:
Divert all teams searching for Cactus
units to search for Yukina Shirahane!
jp_text:
カクタス捜索の全小隊を
白羽由希奈 捜索に当てろ！
google_translated:
Showing squadron of cactus search
Kakano Yuka Rina Cottora Search!

en_text:
<i>This Cube is the cockpit
<i>of the Kuromukuro.
jp_text: この〝キューブ〞
